S01khasrpsu:2: iha śubhaṅkaranāmā upāsakaḥ śubhakarmakārī karuṇāyamānaḥ sa kila potalakagamanodyataḥ /
S01khasrpsu:5: mā gaccha tvam ihāsmān vairocanābhisaṃbodhitantrarājakrameṇa sthāpaya tena mahān satvārtho bhaviṣyati /
S01khasrpsu:8: tatra bhagavataḥ sādhanāya dṛṛṣṭisaṃpattiḥ kriyate / tathā hi
S01khasrpsu:9: varaṃ bhikṣoḥ śīlavipattir na punar dṛṣṭivipattir iti /
S01khasrpsu:10: atas tatra tāvat kṣaṇikān nirātmakān sarvadharmān vyavalokya vyapagatasakalavikalpaḥ kṛpāśayo 'ho vatāmī satvāḥ kleśakarmādibhir upadrutāḥ /
S01khasrpsu:11: tato jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhair (Khs_12) atīva pīḍyamānāḥ santo 'nekaprakāraduḥkham anubhavanti /
S01khasrpsu:12: tato 'haṃ lokeśvaro bhūtvā teṣāṃ duḥkhādy apanayāmi /
S01khasrpsu:14: ity evaṃ pratijñāśayaṃ kṛtvā svahṛdi paṃkārajasahaśradalapadmavarāṭakamadhye akārajacandramaṇḍalopari āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ iti pañca bījāni vinyasya /
S01khasrpsu:15_0: etadraśmimālābhiḥ sañcodyānīya tān gurubuddhabodhisatvān gaganatale purovartinaḥ
S01khasrpsu:15_3: 'ham ity uccārya śūnyatābodhim kṛtvā bhagavān avalokiteśvaro yoginātmanā bhūyate /
S01khasrpsu:47: (Khs_13) oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi rakṣa o māṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā //
S01khasrpsu:49: oṃ āgaccha bhagavan maṇḍalakasiṃhāsane oṃ āḥ iti mantrakṛtādhyeṣāṇāyāṃ kṛtamaṇḍalamadhyasiṃhāsanopari sahasradalapadmasthapañcātmakam pūjayed iti /
S01khasrpsu:59: oṃ āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ phaṭ svāhā //
S01khasrpsu:60: oṃ sarvatathāgatasulalitanamitair namāmi bhagavantaṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ pratīccha kusumāñjalir nātha hoḥ /
S01khasrpsu:64: gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇa ntu sarvabhautikā imaṃ baliṃ svāhā /
S01khasrpsu:66: atha pūjārambhakāle evam uccārya cittaṃ śodhanīyaṃ /
S01khasrpsu:72: tadā rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ syāt /
S01khasrpsu:73: iha sarva eva satvā rāgadveṣamohāśayāḥ // tathā hi
S01khasrpsu:75: dveṣajena rāgeṇa mohajena vaiśravaṇo yakṣo bhūtaḥ /
S01khasrpsu:76: ity ato rāgadveṣamohādīn parihṛtya cittaśuddhyā karuṇāyamānacittena sarvāṇy eva dānādikuśalamūlāni kartavyāni /
